name: Julie's walk
description: hi everyone , this is my entry to GMTK Game Jam 2021 This is Game where A boy takes his dog to walking and you save the boy and dog from coming dangers and obstacles. controls:- The WASD keys control the dog and arrow keys control the boy. Beware if you go outside the range of camera or touch a obstacle you die.                                                                   Enjoy the game                                                                 sorry for any bugs                                                                 thankyou
